attachments.title: THE FUNKSHUN VOL. 2 | MIXED BY K-$ADILLA & CURATED BY BLR & K-$ADILLA (6/8/17) by THUNDERSTONE RADIO
attachments.text:
Get ya stretch in folks because we got some jiggy music on deck for y'all with The Funkshun Vol.2. If you didn't pull your hamstring after the last Funkshun, get ready for a mix full of future funk, future disco, vaporwave bangers for you to get loose to. So, you better make sure that jheri curl juice ain't flowing too much, ya weave in tact, or dat S-Curl is poppin because you about to shake dat ass for the one time to the best shit you never heard on Thunderstone Radio.

Tracklist:
1. Frivole de Nuit - Ziggy Phunk
2. Makeithappen - Aaron Brockovich
3. Dark Material - Hunter
4. Too Late - Classic Files
5. Somebody - Vanilla
6. Break - Aaron Brockovich
7. Cosmicboii - Mr Surf
8. Love Saw It - Childhood
9. Remember - Aritus
10. Highlights - FIBRE
11. Gotta Have You - Cyan Blue & Lola Disco
12. Dela - Tui
13. Japanese Bae - Cabron
14. Welcome to Aloe Island - Aloe Island Posse
15. That Nu Thang - Aulturon
16. Body Language - Cabron
17. Move Your Feet - Agrume
